hero.title: Intelligent print inspection & maintenance
hero.lead: GPCS combines computer vision with industrial workflows. Scancontroll detects print defects in real time. MaintControl digitalizes maintenance, spare parts and notifications. Less waste, less downtime, more quality.

products.title: Products
products.lead: Two connected systems – for print and manufacturing maintenance.

scan.title: AI label & print inspection
scan.desc: Automatic defect detection, OCR/Barcode comparison and ΔE colour deviations. Master comparison, web segmentation, PDF reports.

maint.title: Digital machine maintenance
maint.desc: QR machine cards, failure tracking, spare parts store, planning and costs. Overview for manager and technician.

tech.title: Technologies
tech.lead: Modern FE/BE stack and computer vision. Open architecture for integrations.

b1.d: Early detection of deviations reduces costs and complaints.

b2.d: Fast escalation, parts store and plan keep the line running.

b3.d: PDF outputs with metrics (OCR/ΔE/SSIM, barcode) and history.

demo.title: Book a consultation
demo.lead: Live demo on your samples or data. We advise on hardware, process and deployment.

form.name: Full name
form.err: Failed to send. Try again or email info@gpcs.sk.

kiosk.title: KIOSK – online & offline
kiosk.p1: Universal KIOSK for broad use — works reliably even without internet and safely synchronizes once connected. Ideal for print, manufacturing and building entrances.
kiosk.pg1: Self-service job submission, PDF upload and proof approval.
kiosk.pg2: Job status tracking, pickup of finished prints, complaints with photos.
kiosk.pg3: QR/barcode to link to a job, integration with workflow/ERP.
kiosk.en1: Information board: building notices, visitor mode, fault reporting.
kiosk.en2: Room/service reservations, dashboards and key contacts — available offline.
kiosk.en3: Secure kiosk mode, remote management and automatic updates.
kiosk.ytOpen: Open video in a new tab
